about_the_game:
Upgrade Your Fleet

Upgrade your fleet with the colossal Undead battleship Dread and her notorious Captain Morte Shadehowler.

Bundle Contents

  • Undead Battleship: 'Dread'
  • Undead Captain: 'Morte Shadehowler'
  • 3 Undead Mates
  • 'Pitch' Skin

Undead Passive

Siphon: Cannon damage dealt by Undead ships repair their armor slightly

Ship Passive

Toll: When this ship is damaged by an enemy ship, the attackers cannon accuracy is greatly reduced until the curse expires.

Ship Tier X

Dread Spirits: Periodically releases a pulse of souls, dealing damage to nearby ships

New Captain: Morte Shadehowler


Morte Shadehowler's Dark Miasma
Nearby enemies have their vision substantially occluded.
